name: querySlice
description: Returns a query containing a subset of another query

params.name: offset
params.description: The first row to include in the new query

params.name: length
params.description: The number of rows to include in the new query, defaults to all remaining rows

examples.title: Create a query with 4 rows and return a new query containing the 2nd and 3rd rows of the first
Using a member function
